reviews.review:
[h1]向日葵游戏评分：7分（1-10）[/h1]
CS系列中不得不提的一部作品。
CS系列从发售至今，一直在更新和进步，这一款04年发行的零点行动是系列中唯一一部包含单人战役的作品。虽然游戏的画面在现在看来十分古董，但是你仍然可以找到人在线联机对战。
购买这款零点行动会附赠CS1.6版本，同样购买CS1.6也会附赠零点行动。
零点行动购买后库里会有2个游戏，分别是Counter-Strike: Condition Zero和Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes，前者用于对战，后者只包含单人战役。
[h1]欢迎大家关注我们的鉴赏家：https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28763059[/h1]
[h1]关注微信公众号和头条号“向日葵游戏”获取更多资讯；官方微博：向日葵游戏评测[/h1]

The Tour of Duty mode is really fun and I am enjoying it. The extra detail on the guns, player models, and maps is nice as well.

If you have always just wanted to play Counter Strike 1.6 with bots this really is a no brainer. I waited 13 years to do it, but I paid $1 CAD for this game. It is CS 1.6 with bots and it is actually pretty awesome.

foda

Okay, so if you buy this game you get 3 games: CS 1.6 CS:CZ and CS:CZ Deleted scenes. I don't think CS:CZ is good, but i think 1.6 is overall a better game, because it has far more players, and maybe 1.6 doesn't look as good as CZ, but CZ still looks pretty bad. CS:CZ Deleted scenes is worth it in my opinion, because it's Counter Strike campaign, where you travel across the world. There are 12 missions in Deleted scenes, but in normal CZ there are missions that are BORING and easy. Overall, i recommend to buy this game for Deleted scenes and 1.6. I don't recommend playing the normal CZ, because the missions are boring, multiplayer doesn't have alot people playing it, and 1.6 just feels better in my opinion. I do NOT hate CZ, i just don't like it.

Le 3rd meilleur CS

Şahsen Counter Strike: Condition Zero için pek umutlu değildim. yanışlmışım :s

Oyun yılına göre gayet güzel içeriğe sahip ancak neden bu kadar tutulmamış bilemem.
Hikaye kısmı fena değil bir aksiyon oyunu campaign'inde ne varsa bundada ondan fazlası yok ancak gayet güzel yinede.
Hikaye uzun gereğince gayet güzel bir deneyim. Kısacası eğleniyorsunuz. Gelelim oynunun eksilerine:

1-A.I. o yıllar için bile kötü, adamlar yürümüyor, koşmuyor, IŞINLANIYORLAR. Adamların sıktığı tek kurşun sizin HP'nizi yarılamaya yetiyor. Ayrıca hepsi kötü A.I. olmanın getirdiği WallHack özelliğide mevcut.

2-Auto Save beni çıldırttı en ufak hatanızda affetmiyor baştan yada yarısından başlatıyor gerçekten kötü olmuş.

3- Oyunda ufak tefekte olsa bug var yine belirtmek isterim yine A.I. yüzünden kaynaklı bu bugların yarısı.

4- Oyunda normal zorluk günümüz expert zorluğu gibi resmen can çekişiyorsunuz milyonlarca WallHack sahibi A.I. kardeşlerimizle :D

Şimdilik bu kadar ilerde güncelleme yapacağım oyun şimdilik tavsiyemdir ileride ne olur hiçbir fikrim yok.

Dip Not: Save kısmını kendiniz ara menüden yapın yoksa cidden çıldırıyorsunuz aynı bölümü 114384593458 kez oynayınca.

Loved the game back in the days when i played it nonsteam
I played well over 500 hrs mostly offline missions with hard or expert bots
Now, this game just doesnt feel like a game that i could play for even 30 minutes straight!
Filled with nosteamers and mostly aim-hackers -_-
Awp and ak are trash in this game (especially for online play even with 30 ping)
Would recommend buying m4 and deagle , since most of the servers give u $16000 even if u join late or playing the first round...
I would say you'd rather go for Source or Global Offensive for a better Counter-Strike experience :)

I find it ironic how a dated game with more-so-than-not pixelated graphics running on an old engine can have more AND better content than both its prequels and other games within the same genre. When's the next time you're going to use a riot shield, or build your own mini-setups in game, or be able to play independent missions that don't require a plot or explanation because they do that for themselves? Yeah, thought so.
